resources.string: Reset the data value from the settings app?
To provide a functioning user experience the app needs to ask you for data usage tracking permission. Please use the "Settings" button to give permission.
Please enter your current mobile data usage down below by checking with the button "Settings"
This indicates the remaining data you can use today to stay within your monthly limit.
This indicates the data you have already used up this month.
Enter your monthly data limit to start the calculation.
If you use a mobile data plan with unlimited data, you can use this mode to track your data usage.
This shows you the current day and month and how much of the current month has already passed in a percentage.

The progress bar helps you see how well you\'re managing your data usage. It uses color to show if you\'re on track or exceeding your monthly limit, giving you a clear picture of your current situation.
The progress bar shows you if your usage in this month is over or under the usage of lasts month. It uses color to indicate if you are above or under.
This is an app widget description
Please disable battery optimization to allow the app to run essential tasks in the background. Select "all Apps" and search for "DATA"
